product_name: Helly Hansen Chill Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Hike in style and comfort in the men's Helly Hansen Chill Shirt. It wicks away moisture and blocks UV rays and the recycled polyester/organic cotton blend is easy on the environment. Yarn-dyed checked short-sleeve shirt takes you from trail to town with ease. Recycled-polyester/organic cotton fabric offers UPF 30 sun protection. Organic cotton is breathable and easy care, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Helly Hansen Chill Shirt for men has button-down styling with 1 chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Hike in style and comfort in the men's Helly Hansen Chill Shirt. It wicks away moisture and blocks UV rays and the recycled polyester/organic cotton blend is easy on the environment.
